00021   unsigned int splitCommBinary( MPI_Comm orig_comm, MPI_Comm *new_comm) {
00022     int npes, rank;
00023 
00024     MPI_Group  orig_group, new_group;
00025 
00026     MPI_Comm_size(orig_comm, &npes);
00027     MPI_Comm_rank(orig_comm, &rank);
00028 
00029     unsigned int splitterRank = binOp::getPrevHighestPowerOfTwo(npes);
00030 
00031     int *ranksAsc, *ranksDesc;
00032     //Determine sizes for the 2 groups 
00033     ranksAsc = new int[splitterRank];
00034     ranksDesc = new int[( npes - splitterRank)];
00035 
00036     int numAsc = 0;
00037     int numDesc = ( npes - splitterRank - 1);
00038 
00039     //This is the main mapping between old ranks and new ranks.
00040     for(int i=0; i<npes; i++) {
00041       if( static_cast<unsigned int>(i) < splitterRank) {
00042         ranksAsc[numAsc] = i;
00043         numAsc++;
00044       }else {
00045         ranksDesc[numDesc] = i;
00046         numDesc--;
00047       }
00048     }//end for i
00049 
00050     MPI_Comm_group(orig_comm, &orig_group);
00051 
00052     /* Divide tasks into two distinct groups based upon rank */
00053     if (static_cast<unsigned int>(rank) < splitterRank) {
00054       MPI_Group_incl(orig_group, splitterRank, ranksAsc, &new_group);
00055     }else {
00056       MPI_Group_incl(orig_group, (npes-splitterRank), ranksDesc, &new_group);
00057     }
00058 
00059     MPI_Comm_create(orig_comm, new_group, new_comm);
00060 
00061     delete [] ranksAsc;
00062     ranksAsc = NULL;
00063     
00064     delete [] ranksDesc;
00065     ranksDesc = NULL;
00066 
00067     return splitterRank;
00068   }//end function

00070   unsigned int splitCommBinaryNoFlip( MPI_Comm orig_comm, MPI_Comm *new_comm) {
00071     int npes, rank;
00072 
00073     MPI_Group  orig_group, new_group;

00075     MPI_Comm_size(orig_comm, &npes);
00076     MPI_Comm_rank(orig_comm, &rank);
00077 
00078     unsigned int splitterRank =  binOp::getPrevHighestPowerOfTwo(npes);
00079 
00080     int *ranksAsc, *ranksDesc;
00081     //Determine sizes for the 2 groups 
00082     ranksAsc = new int[splitterRank];
00083     ranksDesc = new int[( npes - splitterRank)];
00084 
00085     int numAsc = 0;
00086     int numDesc = 0; //( npes - splitterRank - 1);
00087

00089     for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00090       if(static_cast<unsigned int>(i) < splitterRank) {
00091         ranksAsc[numAsc] = i;
00092         numAsc++;
00093       }else {
00094         ranksDesc[numDesc] = i;
00095         numDesc++;
00096       }
00097     }//end for i
00098 
00099     MPI_Comm_group(orig_comm, &orig_group);
00100 
00101     /* Divide tasks into two distinct groups based upon rank */

00103       MPI_Group_incl(orig_group, splitterRank, ranksAsc, &new_group);
00104     }else {
00105       MPI_Group_incl(orig_group, (npes-splitterRank), ranksDesc, &new_group);
00106     }

00109

00111     ranksAsc = NULL;
00112     
00113     delete [] ranksDesc;
00114     ranksDesc = NULL;

00119   //create Comm groups and remove empty processors...
00120   int splitComm2way(bool iAmEmpty, MPI_Comm * new_comm, MPI_Comm comm) {
00121 #ifdef __PROFILE_WITH_BARRIER__
00122     MPI_Barrier(comm);
00123 #endif
00124     PROF_SPLIT_COMM_2WAY_BEGIN
00125 
00126       MPI_Group  orig_group, new_group;
00127     int size;
00128     MPI_Comm_size(comm, &size);
00129 
00130     bool* isEmptyList = new bool[size];
00131     par::Mpi_Allgather<bool>(&iAmEmpty, isEmptyList, 1, comm);
00132 
00133     int numActive=0, numIdle=0;
00134     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00135       if(isEmptyList[i]) {
00136         numIdle++;
00137       }else {
00138         numActive++;
00139       }
00140     }//end for i
00141 
00142     int* ranksActive = new int[numActive];
00143     int* ranksIdle = new int[numIdle];
00144 
00145     numActive=0;
00146     numIdle=0;
00147     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00148       if(isEmptyList[i]) {
00149         ranksIdle[numIdle] = i;
00150         numIdle++;
00151       }else {
00152         ranksActive[numActive] = i;
00153         numActive++;
00154       }
00155     }//end for i
00156 
00157     delete [] isEmptyList;      
00158     isEmptyList = NULL;
00159 
00160     /* Extract the original group handle */
00161     MPI_Comm_group(comm, &orig_group);
00162 
00163     /* Divide tasks into two distinct groups based upon rank */
00164     if (!iAmEmpty) {
00165       MPI_Group_incl(orig_group, numActive, ranksActive, &new_group);
00166     }else {
00167       MPI_Group_incl(orig_group, numIdle, ranksIdle, &new_group);
00168     }
00169 
00170     /* Create new communicator */
00171     MPI_Comm_create(comm, new_group, new_comm);
00172 
00173     delete [] ranksActive;
00174     ranksActive = NULL;
00175     
00176     delete [] ranksIdle;
00177     ranksIdle = NULL;
00178 
00179     PROF_SPLIT_COMM_2WAY_END
00180   }//end function

00182   int splitCommUsingSplittingRank(int splittingRank, MPI_Comm* new_comm,
00183       MPI_Comm comm) {
00184 #ifdef __PROFILE_WITH_BARRIER__
00185     MPI_Barrier(comm);
00186 #endif
00187     PROF_SPLIT_COMM_BEGIN
00188 
00189       MPI_Group  orig_group, new_group;
00190     int size;
00191     int rank;
00192     MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00193     MPI_Comm_size(comm, &size);
00194 
00195     int* ranksActive = new int[splittingRank];
00196     int* ranksIdle = new int[size - splittingRank];
00197 
00198     for(int i = 0; i < splittingRank; i++) {
00199       ranksActive[i] = i;
00200     }
00201 
00202     for(int i = splittingRank; i < size; i++) {
00203       ranksIdle[i - splittingRank] = i;
00204     }
00205 
00206     /* Extract the original group handle */
00207     MPI_Comm_group(comm, &orig_group);
00208 
00209     /* Divide tasks into two distinct groups based upon rank */
00210     if (rank < splittingRank) {
00211       MPI_Group_incl(orig_group, splittingRank, ranksActive, &new_group);
00212     }else {
00213       MPI_Group_incl(orig_group, (size - splittingRank), ranksIdle, &new_group);
00214     }
00215 
00216     /* Create new communicator */
00217     MPI_Comm_create(comm, new_group, new_comm);
00218 
00219     delete [] ranksActive;
00220     ranksActive = NULL;
00221     
00222     delete [] ranksIdle;
00223     ranksIdle = NULL;
00224 
00225     PROF_SPLIT_COMM_END
00226   }//end function

00229   int splitComm2way(const bool* isEmptyList, MPI_Comm * new_comm, MPI_Comm comm) {
00230       
00231     MPI_Group  orig_group, new_group;
00232     int size, rank;
00233     MPI_Comm_size(comm, &size);
00234     MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00235

00237     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00238       if(isEmptyList[i]) {
00239         numIdle++;
00240       }else {
00241         numActive++;
00242       }
00243     }//end for i
00244 
00245     int* ranksActive = new int[numActive];
00246     int* ranksIdle = new int[numIdle];
00247 
00248     numActive=0;
00249     numIdle=0;
00250     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00251       if(isEmptyList[i]) {
00252         ranksIdle[numIdle] = i;
00253         numIdle++;
00254       }else {
00255         ranksActive[numActive] = i;
00256         numActive++;
00257       }
00258     }//end for i
00259 
00260     /* Extract the original group handle */
00261     MPI_Comm_group(comm, &orig_group);
00262 
00263     /* Divide tasks into two distinct groups based upon rank */
00264     if (!isEmptyList[rank]) {
00265       MPI_Group_incl(orig_group, numActive, ranksActive, &new_group);
00266     }else {
00267       MPI_Group_incl(orig_group, numIdle, ranksIdle, &new_group);
00268     }

00274     ranksActive = NULL;
00275     
00276     delete [] ranksIdle;
00277     ranksIdle = NULL;
